name: Telerik Academy
body:
# First Semester:

## Programming:

### CSharp Part One

* [Introduction to Programming](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%201%20Lecture%20Introduction-to-Programming)
* [Primitive Data Types and Variables](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%202%20Primitive-Data-Types-and-Variables)
* [Operators Expressions and Statements](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%203%20Operators-Expressions-and-Statements)
[Console Input Output ](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%204%20Console-Input-Output)
* [Conditional Statements](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%205%20Conditional-Statements)
* [Loops](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartOne/Homework%206%20Loops)

### CSharp Part Two

1. Homeworks

* [Arrays](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%231)
* [Multidimensional Arrays](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%232)
* [Methods & Numeral Systems](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%233)
* [Using Classes and Objects](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%234)
* [Exception Handling and Text Files](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%235)
* [Strings and Text Processing](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%236)

2. Exam Preparation

* [6 February 2012](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/Homeworks/Homework%20%236)

3. Actual exam (04.02.2013 morning group)

* [Real Exam](https://github.com/skolev/TelerikAcademy/tree/master/Programming/CSharp%20PartTwo/RealExam)
